üöÄ Quick Start

1

New to LeafLock?

Start with our Privacy Policy

2

System Administrator?

Check the Admin Guide

3

Developer?

Explore our Developer Guide

~/leaflock 
# Deploy LeafLock securely
git clone https://github.com/RelativeSure/LeafLock
cd LeafLock

# Configure environment
cp .env.example .env
# Edit JWT_SECRET, SERVER_ENCRYPTION_KEY

# Start with containers  
make up

# Your secure notes are ready! üéâ

üõ°Ô∏è Why Choose LeafLock?

Built with security and developer experience in mind.

End-to-End Encryption

Your notes are encrypted on your device before reaching our servers

Zero-Knowledge Architecture

We cannot read your notes even if we wanted to

Open Source

Transparent, auditable codebase you can trust

Global Compliance

Built to meet GDPR, CCPA, and international standards

Security First

Regular security audits and best practices implementation

Lightning Fast

Optimized performance with modern web technologies
